translated: Lequel est ton livre ?

original: What was in it for you?
translated: Qu'y avait-il là pour vous ?

original: Where do you live these days?
translated: Où vis-tu dernièrement?

original: Tom filled the bucket to the top.
translated: Tom remplit le seau jusqu'à ras bord.

original: Where's the subway station?
translated: Où est la station de métro ?

original: Look under the seat.
translated: Regarde sous le siège.

original: This district is known for its beautiful scenery.
translated: Cette région est connue pour ses beaux paysages.

original: That makes everything simpler.
translated: Ça rend tout plus simple.

original: They like stories.
translated: Elles apprécient les récits.

original: Nahuatl was the language of the Aztecs.
translated: Le nahuatl était la langue des Aztèques.

original: I woke up at midnight.
translated: Je me suis réveillée à minuit.

original: You feel lonesome, don't you?
translated: Tu te sens seul, n'est-ce pas ?

original: Please write it down.
translated: Veuillez en prendre note.

original: I've got time on my hands.
translated: J’ai du temps devant moi.

original: Ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, sixty, seventy, eighty, ninety, one hundred.
translated: Dix, vingt, trente, quarante, cinquante, soixante, septante, quatre-vingts, nonante, cent.

original: I've fallen in love with you.
translated: Je suis tombée amoureuse de toi.

original: I know your name.
translated: Je sais ton prénom.

original: It is a fish.
translated: Il s'agit d'un poisson.

original: We have to act.
translated: Nous devons agir.

original: Tom is waving at you, you need to go!
translated: Tom te fait signe, il faut que tu y ailles !

original: You two may leave.
translated: Vous deux, vous pouvez partir.

original: The institution of marriage appears to be on the decline.
translated: L'institution du mariage semble être sur le déclin.

original: Get it out of here.
translated: Sors-le d'ici !

original: They adapted to life abroad rather well.
translated: Ils se sont adaptés sans peine à la vie à l'étranger.

original: I do not think that she is at home.
translated: Je ne pense pas qu'elle se trouve chez elle.

original: I couldn't hear what they were saying.
translated: Je n'ai pas pu entendre ce qu'elles disaient.

original: They'll be tough to beat.
translated: Ça va être difficile de les battre.

original: You're the leader.
translated: C'est toi la chef.

original: The situation there was critical.
translated: La situation là-bas était critique.

original: Tom doesn't want to miss any more actions.
translated: Tom ne veut plus manquer aucune action.

original: What's your speciality?
translated: Quelle est votre spécialité ?

original: You know we'd never hurt you.
translated: Vous savez que nous ne vous ferions jamais de mal.

original: I'm trans.
translated: Je suis transgenre.

original: How do you want me to handle that?
translated: Comment veux-tu que je m'y prenne ?

original: You've been swimming.
translated: Tu as nagé.

original: There's something I want you to know.
translated: Il y a quelque chose que je veux que tu saches.

original: Tom took a book down from the shelf.
translated: Tom a pris un livre sur l'étagère.

original: Don't be a fool.
translated: Ne sois pas idiot.

original: All hope of my promotion went up in smoke after my reorganization plan fell through.
translated: Tous mes espoirs de promotion se sont évanouis après que mon plan de réorganisation eut échoué.

original: I don't date.
translated: Je ne sors pas avec une fille.

original: You've won.
translated: Vous l'avez emporté !

original: You can't get rid of me.
translated: Tu ne peux pas te débarrasser de moi.

original: Take off your clothes.
translated: Ôte tes vêtements !

original: This is my favorite color.
translated: C'est ma couleur préférée.

original: Tom can't swim as well as Mary.
translated: Tom ne sait pas nager aussi bien que Mary.

original: We have a lot to learn from each other.
translated: Nous avons beaucoup à apprendre les uns des autres.

original: It hurts.
translated: Ça fait mal.

original: They knew how much danger they were in.
translated: Elles savaient en quels périls ils se trouvaient.

original: Do you want to wait in the car?
translated: Est-ce que tu veux attendre dans la voiture ?

original: Mary awoke Tom in the middle of the night.
translated: Marie réveilla Tom au milieu de la nuit.

original: You understand what I'm saying, don't you?
translated: Tu comprends ce que je suis en train de dire, n'est-ce pas ?

original: I'm stumped.
translated: Je sèche.

original: Who usually sits on the dunce's seat?
translated: Qui est assis habituellement sur ​​le banc d'infamie ?

original: France attacked Algeria in 1830.
translated: La France a attaqué l'Algérie en 1830.

original: What on earth are you doing here?
translated: Que faites-vous diable là ?

original: He doesn't want to go; neither do I.
translated: Il ne veut pas y aller ; moi non plus.

original: He is not coming, according to her.
translated: Il ne va pas venir, d'après elle.

original: Let's look at this program.
translated: Regardons ce programme.

original: There was much food in the house.
translated: Il y avait beaucoup de nourriture dans la maison.

original: I doubt Tom really needs to do that.
translated: Je doute que Tom ait vraiment besoin de faire ça.

original: I realized that I didn't understand anything.
translated: Je me suis rendu compte que je ne comprenais rien.

original: We were made to be together.
translated: Nous étions faits pour être ensemble.

original: Don't use slang if you can help it.
translated: N'utilisez pas d'argot, si possible.

original: I'm lucky to have you as a friend.
translated: Je suis chanceuse de t'avoir comme amie.
